snippet: General Motors hasn’t offered a diesel passenger car since the diesel-powered Chevette chugged unceremoniously into its lineup in 1986. But the company is back with its efficient Chevrolet Cruze Turbo Diesel.
abstract: General Motors hasn’t offered a diesel passenger car since the diesel-powered Chevette chugged unceremoniously into its lineup in 1986. But the company is back with its efficient Chevrolet Cruze Turbo Diesel.

headline.main: Video: G.M. Tries Diesel Again, This Time With an Efficient Chevy Cruze

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Chevrolet Division of General Motors Corp
